messages.subject: Re: Samurai depictions
messages.msgSnippet: For anyone interested, I have a lot of depictions of Samurai, though only one is specifically an actual known historical figure (Benkei) on my web site. The
messages.messageBody:
For anyone interested, I have a lot of depictions of Samurai, though only
one is specifically an actual known historical figure (Benkei) on my web
site. The URL is
http://www.hinesfamily.org/sharon

Also. We are now offering these as note cards, as of this week. I would
be very pleased to get e mails from anyone, letting me know how they
liked (or disliked) them.

Benkei and Urashima no Taro are just two of my favorite old folk tales,
but it was fun to add my own illustrations to the many others that were
done by artists, through out history. :-)

Enjoy.

sincerely,
Sharon Hayakawa

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
